verses.verse: ( BOOK V  230 107-150  Thanksgiving for Deliverance) ( 470 8:23-27 ;  480 4:35-41 ;  490 8:22-25 ) הֹד֣וּ <WH3034> hō·ḏū Give thanks לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD, כִּי־ <WH3588> kî- for ט֑וֹב <WH2896> ṭō·wḇ He is good; כִּ֖י <WH3588> kî ... לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> lə·‘ō·w·lām endures forever. חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> ḥas·dōw His loving devotion
